instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Chivo' for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for any ID, Price, or Date to ensure tabular alignment.
Implement the Sidebar as a fixed element on the left (w-64).
Use Shadcn UI components but override the 'rounded-md' to 'rounded-sm' to match the industrial aesthetic.
Ensure high contrast for all text. No gray-on-gray text.
For the Dashboard, use a 'Bento Grid' layout where the Map takes prominence.
Use the 'Safety Orange' accent color sparingly - only for primary actions or critical alerts.
Create a 'Blueprint' pattern background for the app wrapper using CSS radial-gradient dots.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers/overlays.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a data-testid attribute.
